instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Hi, 
I have replaced the display panel, Not the full display assembly but just the panel alone, I don't know the reason. The board boots perfectly, It passes the diagnostic test without any error. But the touch panel is not glowing. 

Some history:-  While removing the display I have disturbed the ribbon cable near the webcam, I think it's broken a little.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
820-xxxxx board code?

Do you note the tocuh bar is working, but missing backlight?
Keyboard backlight works correctly?

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
It must be 820-00239-09, 
But I don't see a keyboard backlight, But the keyboard is working. The touch bar is not working at all, I mean no response no backlight.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: I bet for ALS issue, as you already noted damage on webcam flex.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Is there an option I can fix it ? What is ALS??

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Yes, it is the problem with the display.... Its working with other displays

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Ambient Light Sensor is integrated into webcam electronics.
In your case, ALS is good I suppose, just damaged connection through flex.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Now the board is not turning on anymore, No chime sound... No display, Does it went bad

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Re-check all your work in this machine.
Test the board alone on the desk.
Check for knocked off components, or damaged traces.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Removed the board and checked, The PPBUS_G3H has 2 ohms resistance with respect to ground. But couldn't understand who is causing the short. And the current consumption of the board is 20V and approximately 40mA (May is not accurate)

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
I hope you've checked resistance to ground without power.
Compare that value with resistance to ground on all coils.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Yes I have measured the resistance to ground without power.
Here are more measurements 

L3500 - 636 Ohm 
L8410 - 4.3 Mohm
L7030 - 1.23 Mohm
L7600 - 0.6 Mohm
L7660 -1.6Mohm

L7430 - 2 Ohm 
L7420 - 2Ohm 
L7410 - 2 Ohm

L7210 - 4.2 Ohm 
L7220 - 4.2Ohm 

L7270 -6.7Ohm
L8000 - 89.7 Ohm
L8050 - 69.3Ohm
L7900 - 245 Ohm 
L7960 - 50 Ohm
LB700 -1.6K Ohm 
L9400 - 3.1KOhm

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: One of U7410/20/30 is shorted...

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: I have removed all the three inductors, The sort is after the inductor I mean on the 2nd pin towards the load side.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Sorry Just noticed that
After removing the inductor's Load side is 1.6 Ohm (2nd pins of all three inductors).
L7430   1st pin - 1.017K
L7420    1st pin - 425 Ohm
L7410   1st pin - 1.017K

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: I am confused now, Is the problem is at the load side or at the source side?

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
There is no short on CPU side, just normal value.
I said one chip is shorted between PPBUS_G3H and one CPU coil.
You've removed all three, how do you know which is the culprit now???
Need to check between the pins of each chip, outside of the board, to find the bad one.

BTW, you can see no short to ground on PPBUS_G3H now.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
I have removed the three inductors and measured the resistance at 1st and 2nd pin of the inductors.
2nd pin of all the inductors are 1.8 ohm .

1st pin resistance are below.

L7430 1st pin - 1.017K
L7420 1st pin - 425 Ohm
L7410 1st pin - 1.017K
.......

Please ignore what I did, do you have any suggestions to figure out which chip is causing the issue?

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
You are right when I removed the inductors I don't see any short in ppbus_g3h .

I thought it's the problem with CPU ☹️.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Who talked about caps???
"One of U7410/20/30 is shorted"
PLEASE, pay atention when you read the posts.

Do you mean these chips are still onboard?
Then remove U7420 first.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Sorry, My approach was different. My Apologies.
Back to the board, I have removed U7420, Now PPBUS_G3H gives 0.373V in diode mode. Which means there is no short. Should I replace the FDMF5808A (U7420) with a new one?

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
New, or old from other board.
Just be sure no short present on PPBUS_G3H, after chip is soldered on the board.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Hi,
I have replaced  U7420, Now all the voltages are there except  PPVCCSA_S0_CPU and PPVCC_S0_CPU. There is some common signal missing, I couldn't check the PWM pin.  CPUCORE_FCCM is 0V and PVCC is 13V and PP5V_S0_VCORE is 5V.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Very likely dead CPU, because of overvoltage caused by U7420.

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: Really?☹️

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message:
Is there anything I can do, Or I should scrap this board? Is there any option to confirm it is the CPU that is dead?
Maybe a stupid question, Will it be possible to replace the CPU by a professional micro soldering company?

threads.title: A1706 emc3163 touch bar not working after display replacement.
threads.message: "Very likely" unfortunatelly...
